Title: Il ruggito della leonessa
Writer: Roberto Saviano (idea), Roberto Saviano (novel), Giovanni Bianconi (developer), Stefano Bises (developer), Leonardo Fasoli (developer), Ludovica Rampoldi (developer), Roberto Saviano (developer), Stefano Bises (story), Stefano Bises (story), Giovanni Bianconi (story), Stefano Bises (teleplay)
Actors: Marco D'Amore, Fortunato Cerlino, Maria Pia Calzone, Salvatore Esposito
Plot: Imma and Genny travel to Milan to get the needed cash from Musi, but he has diverted the liquid investments for his own use. When Musi has difficulty accessing the cash, he becomes ...
